meanings.definition: Requiring precise adherence to rules or regulations
meanings.sent1: The teacher had the strictest rules in the entire school.
meanings.sent2: Following the strictest guidelines ensures safety in the laboratory.
meanings.sent3: The strictest squirrel in the forest insisted on organizing all the acorns by size.
meanings.sent4: His strictest gaze could make even the rowdiest students quiet down.
meanings.sent5: The strictest measure of success was how well one followed the instructions.

meanings.sent1: Her handwriting was the strictest among all her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The architect's design was executed with the strictest attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The strictest chef in the kitchen could tell if a dish was missing a pinch of salt.
meanings.sent4: The strictest alignment of the stars marked the beginning of the new year.
meanings.sent5: The strictest measurement of time was crucial for the experiment's success.

meanings.definition: Severely limiting or restricting in scope or extent
meanings.sent1: Living under the strictest budget meant no unnecessary expenses.
meanings.sent2: The strictest curfew was imposed during the city-wide lockdown.
meanings.sent3: The strictest diet allowed only one type of fruit for the entire week.
meanings.sent4: The strictest boundaries of the kingdom were guarded by fierce warriors.
meanings.sent5: The strictest control over the situation prevented any further chaos.
